title: "The Talk: Version 2.0"
description: Nick is outspoken. he is loud. He can be a bit obnoxious at times, and that's all right with him. When tragedy struck last summer, it was impossible to even pass up this opportunity to talk and possibly use these attributes he has honed so gracefully over the course of his life. He became involved not only to talk about something he sees as incredulously important, but to hopefully create a lasting effect on everyone listening.
author: Nick Calles
